title: LFG for casual SR normals
body:
Just looking for some people to play with in standard SR matches. Ideally people who wont get worked up if I don't do so well in-game (I haven't touched SR in a while, and most of it this year has been coop, so I imagine I wont do very well). Really looking to get those Kayn missions done, but ARAM is just too unreliable for it.

Add me on either HeartVine or SparksElm (or both, if you want).
